query.name: kibsd.razkids.students
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT s.student_number AS "Student ID", t.email_addr, s.first_name AS "First Name", s.last_name AS "Last Name", '' as reading_level, sa.computer_password, CASE WHEN s.grade_level = 0 THEN 'KG' ELSE '0' || TO_CHAR(s.grade_level) END AS "Grade" FROM CC cc JOIN Sections sec ON cc.SectionID = sec.ID JOIN Teachers t ON sec.teacher = t.id JOIN Courses c ON cc.Course_Number = c.Course_Number JOIN Students s ON cc.studentid = s.id JOIN U_DEF_ACCOUNT_MGMT sa ON s.dcid = sa.studentsdcid JOIN Schools sch ON s.SchoolID = sch.school_number WHERE cc.TermID >= 2800 AND c.COURSE_NAME LIKE '%Reading%' AND cc.schoolid IN (280010,280020,280150,280030,280040,280080,280090,280100,280110,280060,280120) AND s.grade_level IN (0,1,2,3,4,5)

query.name: kibsd.razkids.teachers
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT t.email_addr AS "Teacher ID", t.First_Name AS "First Name", t.Last_Name AS "Last Name", t.email_addr, sch.name AS "Site Name", 'teacher' AS "Role" FROM CC cc JOIN Sections sec ON cc.SectionID = sec.ID JOIN Teachers t ON sec.Teacher = t.ID JOIN Courses c ON cc.Course_Number = c.Course_Number JOIN Schools sch ON cc.SchoolID = sch.school_number WHERE cc.TermID >= 2800 AND c.COURSE_NAME LIKE '%Reading%' AND cc.schoolid IN (280010,280020,280150,280030,280040,280080,280090,280100,280110,280060,280120)
